page.title: 04BREAN COASTAL AREA
page.content: THE AREA IS WIDELY USED BY TOURISTS,A SHIP ADJACENT TO THE COAST ABOUT A KM WIDE.THERE ARE VARIOUS,CARAVAN SITES,WARREN FARM TOURING SITE,BREAN DOWN AND BREAN CARAVAN PARK,SEAVIEW CARAVAN PARK.THERE IS ALSO A HOTEL,THE BREAN DOWN INN AND VARIOUS SHOPS,FISH AND CHIPS,POST OFFICE GENERAL STORES.SOME OF THE STORES ONLY OPEN IN THE SUMMER BUT THE POST OFFICE STAYS OPEN FOR LOCALS.AT THE END OF THE ROAD AT BREAN DOWN THERE IS A CAFE,STORES AND OUT GALLERY WHICH ARE OWNED BY MAURACE BISHOP.THERE IS ALSO A BIRD SANCTUARY AT BREAN DOWN WHICH WAS OPENED IN 1912,AND HAS GROWN EVER SINCE.A FERRY RUNS FROM THE EAST SIDE OF BREAN DOWN TO UPHILL IN THE SUMMER,AND A SMALL CHARGE IS MADE,FIFTY PENCE PER ADULT.
